name: Quartus Technology
description:
Quartus Technology is a Darien, CT based Mobile App Development Company specializing in iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Blackberry, Android and Windows Mobile apps. Quartus Technology is a collection of dedicated Graphic Designers, Programmers and Marketing Professionals and who work together and collaborate with our clients to create solutions of the highest quality standard. We strive for our clients success.
Working in a team effort, we take your concept, sculpt it into beautiful artwork, develop it into thoroughly tested App and finally publish it to the App Store. Following this we use our internally developed proprietary set of techniques for mobile marketing and App Store Optimization, to bring your app to prominence at no additional cost to you. We provide our valuable marketing service to all of our clients as a value add, as we believe that your success is our success Our Mobile App Development process is simple, straight-forward and relatively inexpensive. Quality workmanship and satisfied customers is our #1 goal. Our Mobile App Developers are very passionate about Programming and Developing Apps.
